Title: Interview on radio station Mediacorp Capital 958
Paragraphs:
Black Dot Research Managing Director Nicholas Fang and NTU undergraduate Lee Yun Ting from student-led campaign Sure Anot  share their thoughts on fake news surrounding the Wuhan novel coronavirus and how Singaporeans can play their part in the fight against falsehoods on radio station Mediacorp CAPITAL 958 城市频道.
